    • Constructor Detail

      • Net

        public Net​(int[] topology)
        Standard constructor for a fresh Neural net
        Parameters:
        topology - The layout of the net.
        Each int represents the amount of neurons in that particular layer.

      • Net

        public Net​(java.lang.String filePath)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor which takes in a String as a filePath.
        This constructor uses the file as a database for the weights.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The String of the path to the file to be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - For when the file doesn't exist or has a wrong format.

    • Method Detail

      • feedForward

        public void feedForward​(double[] input)
        This method feeds the input array into the input cells.
        It then feeds this forward through the network.
        Parameters:
        input - The new input array.

      • backPropogation

        public void backPropogation​(double[] targetOuput)
        This method Calculates the error rate and the average error rate.
        It also corrects the weights of the cells by using gradients descent.
        Parameters:
        targetOuput - The expected output array.

      • setEta

        public void setEta​(double eta)
        Eta is the overall learning rate which is applied to the gradient.
        Parameters:
